block.p: BADER-Nathan. On May 12, 2000 at age 92. Beloved husband of Beatrice. Adored father of Ann Bader Geller. Loving grandfather of Richard, Larry and Tracy and great grandfather of Alixandre, Zachary and Sophia. Graveside service at Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Sunday, May 14, 2:00 PM. Contributions in his memory may be made to the Alzheimer's Foundation or the American Heart Association.
BADER-Nathan. Papa. The kindest, warmest, most wonderful grandfather that we could ever have. Nobody could ever match you. Love, Richard and Tracy
BADER-Nathan. I will love you and miss you forever. May flights of angels sing thee to thy rest All my Love, Ann
BADER-Nathan. To my beloved Dear. Thank you for a wonderful marriage of almost 70 years. Beatrice
BADER-Nathan. Our condolences to the family of Nathan Bader. Rev. and Mrs. C.A.F.T. Spray Coral Spray and Andy Spray
BADER-Nathan. Grandpa. You are the best. I will love you always. Tracy
